title: Build Marisol's Beauty Salon website with booking system

requirements.text: Create a hero section with headline 'Enhancing Your Natural Beauty with Style & Care', subheadline 'Professional Hair & Beauty Services in San Fernando, CA', and two CTA buttons: 'Book Appointment' (scrolls to booking form) and 'Call Now – (747) 279-8532' with click-to-call functionality (tel: link)

quotes:
1️⃣ Hero Section
High-quality salon interior image
Headline: "Enhancing Your Natural Beauty with Style & Care"
Subheadline: Professional Hair & Beauty Services in San Fernando, CA
CTA Buttons:
Book Appointment
Call Now – (747) 279-8532 (click-to-call enabled)

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the headline and subheadline prominently
Two CTA buttons are visible and styled consistently
Call Now button uses tel:(747) 279-8532 link for click-to-call
Book Appointment button scrolls smoothly to the booking form section

requirements.text: Create an About Us section that introduces Marisol as a skilled and experienced hairstylist dedicated to client satisfaction, highlights friendly service, professional techniques, and mentions the 4.6-star rating

quotes:
2️⃣ About Us
Introduce Marisol as a skilled and experienced hairstylist dedicated to client satisfaction.
Highlight friendly service, professional techniques, and strong local reputation (4.6-star rating).

acceptanceCriteria: Section includes introduction text about Marisol's expertise
4.6-star rating is visually displayed
Content conveys warmth and professionalism

requirements.text: Create a Services section with detailed service cards for: Haircut & Styling, Hair Coloring, Hair Treatments, Blow Dry, and Beauty Services. Each card should include a description and starting price placeholder

quotes:
3️⃣ Services Section
Include detailed service cards with descriptions and starting prices:
Haircut & Styling
Hair Coloring
Hair Treatments
Blow Dry
Beauty Services

acceptanceCriteria: Five service cards are displayed with titles, descriptions, and starting prices
Cards are visually consistent and easy to read
Layout works on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Implement an online booking form with fields for Full Name, Phone Number, Email, Select Service (dropdown with the five services), Preferred Date, Preferred Time, and a Submit button. Store booking submissions in the backend

quotes:
4️⃣ Online Booking System
Simple, user-friendly booking form including:
Full Name
Phone Number
Email
Select Service
Preferred Date & Time
Submit Button

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields with proper input types
Service dropdown lists all five services
Date and time inputs are user-friendly
Form submission stores booking data in backend
User receives confirmation after successful submission

requirements.text: Create a Gallery section with a modern grid layout displaying before & after transformations and interior salon images

quotes:
5️⃣ Gallery
Modern grid layout showing:
Before & After transformations
Interior salon images

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays images in a responsive grid layout
Images are optimized for web performance
Grid adjusts appropriately for mobile devices

requirements.text: Create a Reviews section displaying a 4.6-star Google rating and 3-5 client testimonials with star ratings

quotes:
6️⃣ Reviews Section
Display:
4.6-star Google rating
3–5 client testimonials

acceptanceCriteria: 4.6-star rating is prominently displayed with star icons
3-5 testimonial cards are shown with client names and ratings
Section is visually appealing and trustworthy

requirements.text: Create a Contact section displaying the address '11430 Laurel Canyon Blvd C, San Fernando, CA 91340', phone number '(747) 279-8532' with click-to-call functionality, an embedded Google Map for the address, and business hours

quotes:
7️⃣ Contact Section
Address: 11430 Laurel Canyon Blvd C, San Fernando, CA 91340
Phone: (747) 279-8532
Click-to-call enabled
Embedded Google Map
Business hours

acceptanceCriteria: Address is displayed and formatted correctly
Phone number uses tel:(747) 279-8532 link for click-to-call
Google Map is embedded showing the correct location
Business hours are clearly listed

requirements.text: Apply a soft feminine color palette using rose gold, beige, white, and black accents consistently throughout the website. Design should feel clean, stylish, premium, and trustworthy with a welcoming salon atmosphere

quotes: Use a soft feminine color palette (rose gold, beige, white, and black accents). The design must feel clean, stylish, premium, and trustworthy.

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses rose gold, beige, white, and black as primary colors
Typography and spacing convey elegance and professionalism
Overall design feels cohesive and premium
Design works harmoniously across all sections

requirements.text: Ensure the website is fully mobile responsive with fast loading times and optimized images

quotes:
8️⃣ Technical Requirements
Fully mobile responsive
Fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: Website renders correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop screens
Images are optimized for web (compressed, appropriate dimensions)
Page loads quickly without excessive delays

requirements.text: Render generated salon-related images (hero background, gallery images, service icons) as static assets stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced correctly in components
Images load without backend routing

constraints: Use the single-actor Motoko architecture for backend booking storage
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, ui components)
Phone number (747) 279-8532 must be preserved exactly as provided
Address '11430 Laurel Canyon Blvd C, San Fernando, CA 91340' must be preserved exactly
nonGoals: Integration with external booking systems or calendar APIs
